pkgmetadata.longdescription: An R Plug-in for the Distributed Hydrological Model GEOtop // It analyzes raster maps and other information as input/output files from the Hydrological Distributed Model GEOtop. It contains functions and methods to import maps and other keywords from geotop.inpts file. Some examples with simulation cases of GEOtop 2.x/3.x are presented in the package. Any information about the GEOtop Distributed Hydrological Model can be found in the provided documentation.
